nodes.text: Torhaa Phaa was a male Togruta Jedi Knight in the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars. He trained in the Jedi Temple, and sometimes dueled a Jedi Knight. He wielded an orange lightsaber.

Torhaa Phaa, like Frey Suun and Florg Nerfherder, was an NPC in the online game Clone Wars Adventure. Like the other two, he served as a stand-in duelist in multiplayer lightsaber duels when another player could not be found. He could also be seen training under Jedi Master Luminara Unduli.
